nodes.text: Cell two-two-one was one of the prison cells inside a New Republic Correctional Transport, theBothan-Five. The Twi'lek criminal Qin was imprisoned in the cell after being arrested. Around 9 ABY, Qin was rescued by a team of mercenaries. The team then immediately turned on one of their members, the Mandalorian Din Djarin, and trapped him in the cell. Djarin later escaped after attacking a security droid from within the cell and using one of its arms to unlock the cell's door.
Cell two-two-one appeared in the "Chapter 6: The Prisoner," the sixth episode of Jon Favreau's 2019 television series The Mandalorian, which aired on December 13, 2019.
